text: Things may not have ultimately worked out between Scheana Shay and Rob Valletta, as we learned during the most recent Vanderpump Rules reunion. However, Rob recently confirmed to Us Weekly that the two have remained friends since they broke up last year. In fact, Rob isn't exactly ruling out rekindling his romance with Scheana in the future, either. ` ` The way we broke up, it wasn ’ t a bad breakup,'' he told Us Weekly. ` ` If there is the right time, we ’ ll find the right time. ” But for now, Rob is moving on. “ Well, I am dating someone. I am dating someone as of a week and a half ago, so we will see what happens, ” he shared. “ She ’ s a pretty awesome person
